```{r}


grow4 <- function(growth.rate, num_gene){
 num_gen <- num_gene
 generation <- 1:num_gen
 N <- rep(0, num_gen)
 N[1] <- 10 #start from 10 individuals
 for (i in 2:num_gen) {
 N[i] = N[i-1] + (growth.rate * N[i-1] * ((100-N[i-1])/100))
       
  plot(N~generation,type='b')
  }
}
```

```{r}

grow4(i)
```
